items.title: Anker SOLIX winter weekend flash sale drops expanded C1000 gen 1 power station + bag to $729 low, more from $429
items.summary:
As part of its soon-to-end Winter Sale, Anker SOLIX has also launched a 72-hour weekend flash sale that will close out its current savings event, with some notable lows sticking around from the previous flash sale on the F2600 2,560Wh power station and its larger F3800 3,840Wh counterpart. Starting on the lower end of the pricing, you can currently find Anker’s SOLIX C1000 Gen 1 Portable Power Station bundled with an expansion battery and a water-resistant bag for $729 shipped, which beats out its bagless option at Amazon by $141. This package would fetch you $1,898 without any discounts, and hasn’t been featured like this in past sales, instead being split into two separate bundles. Considering the expanded setup has gone as low as $699, and the water-resistant bag on its own has gone as low as $80 (meaning $779 total with their best pricing), this bundle with all three certainly seems to be the lowest price you could score them with, complete with $1,169 savings. There’s also the newer and more compact C1000 Gen 2 Power Station down at $429 shipped, and matching its Amazon pricing. Head below for the full lineup.

more…

items.title: Lectric offers extremely rare price cuts on all e-bikes with some bundled FREE gear for few days – starting from $799 lows
items.summary:
Lectric has launched an unexpected weekend price cut flash sale that is striking $100 off most of its e-bikes, except the premium ONE e-bike with a $500 price cut, as well as some smaller bundle packages up to $220 in size across some series. Things are starting the lowest with the XP Lite2 JW Black Belt-Drive e-bike at $799 shipped, while you’ll have to go with its long-range chain-drive or belt-drive counterparts to also snag some FREE bundled gear. This standard model hardly ever comes with additional FREE gear like the longer-range models, but that lack of extra equipment is offset by the extremely rare $100 discount here that is a first in over a year, marking a new low price as far as we have tracked. Head below to learn more about it, its long-range upgrades, and to browse the full lineup of deals while they last over the next few days.

more…

items.title: Save up to 50% on these Govee lighting devices for inside and outside your home – deals start from $35
items.summary:
Through its official Amazon storefront, Govee is offering its 9.8-foot RGBIC String Downlights at $74.98 shipped, beating its direct website pricing by $10, while its 32.8-foot model is down to $169.98 shipped, which matches its direct website pricing. Coming off their $110 and $200 full prices, you can bring more colorful indoor lighting to your home at these models’ third-best prices, beaten out by falls to $70 and the $60 low we haven’t seen since April of last year for the smaller model, and $160 and a $150 low for the larger models from last year’s fall and winter holidays. Head below to also check out a collection of other devices that are seeing discounts right now, too.

more…

items.title: Hang on, there’s a Trump Phone Ultra coming too?

items.title: Google Photos’ latest feature lets you meme yourself
items.summary: The addition is meant to just be a fun way to explore your photos and experiment with Google's Gemini AI technology, and specifically Nano Banana.

items.title: Meta pauses teen access to AI characters ahead of new version
items.summary: Meta today said that it is pausing teens' access to its AI characters globally across all its apps. The company mentioned that it is not abandoning its efforts but wants to develop an updated version of AI characters for teens.

items.title: Mews, which makes AI-powered hospitality management software, raised a $300M Series D led by EQT Growth at a $2.5B valuation (Tamara Djurickovic/Tech.eu)
items.summary:
Tamara Djurickovic / Tech.eu:
Mews, which makes AI-powered hospitality management software, raised a $300M Series D led by EQT Growth at a $2.5B valuation  —  The $300M Series D round will support Mews in scaling its AI-driven hospitality platform, expanding fintech capabilities, and accelerating growth across North America, Europe, and new markets.

items.title: Here’s what you should know about the US TikTok deal
items.summary: A number of investors are competing for the opportunity to purchase the app, and if a deal were to go through, the platform's U.S. business could have its valuation soar to upward of $60 billion.

items.title: Canadian woman found dead on Australian beach likely died of drowning, autopsy finds
items.summary: Piper James's body was found on a beach surrounded by dingoes, but a coroner found evidence "consistent with drowning".

items.title: MOT: Overseas Travel Proof No Longer Required For Physical Driving Licence Application
items.summary:
